answers.answer: I forget to mention when i masturbate i feel like my balls shrink and go up and shrink... They also tested for bacteria but that came UTI but came neg no bacteria... anything will help

Same thing has happen to me before.  Do you sit alot during the day?  At times if you sit alot your nerves in your left testicle can compress, which would cause the tingle feeling.  Wear loose clothes and wear loose boxers no BRIEFS.... You want both testicles to be loose during the day.... If you wear briefs if will cause more pressure to both testicles.  remember the testicles are made to hang so when you sit they climb up, but if you wear briefs they are already up, which means your applying alot of pressure.  Hope this helps....

I have consider this but this has happen for over three months... it really feels like it expend then shrinks and it feels like it's in constant... it's everyday... when i say everyday it's everyday... doesn't not hurt but it really annoying,,, I thought it was herpes with out blister but both of blood exam have come up neg... I do have tendency of mastubarting quite alot... at least once everyday.... sometimes 2-5 times.... could this be why? I am just frustrated with feeling this for over such period of time...
Any doc could guide me in the right direction?

Hello,This tingling sensation can be due to overmasturbation causing nerve compression,allergic reaction,  anxiety, contact dermatitis, diabetes, prostatitis, genital herpes or diabetes or vitamin B 12 deficiency.Get your blood sugar and thyroid hormones levels evaluated. You can take some vit B12 for some days like Neurobion and see if the tingling is gone or not.If symptoms persist then get an evaluation done from a dermatologist.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

Dr.Thank you very much for responding i will go and buy the B-12 tomorrow first thing in the morning. I think i could eliminate Ghsv since its not predome sysmtops. I Took two Blood exam and were neg for both. I think it could be related to Diabetes because it turn on my family. I will get blood sugar levels done and thyroid hormone levels. One last question doc, could of the three day drinking cause nerve damage and cause this sensation?  I really don't know how to thank you!

Hello,It is true that tingling and numbness are common in alcoholics but three days of drinking will not cause such problems. I suggest you to stop taking any alcohol for some days and take some vitamin B 12 supplements.I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

Thank you very much Doc for all of your help,I will surely try vitamins B-12, I am also getting anxiety medicine sold pharmacy and lastly I am getting new boxer and using only one kinda of detergent in case it is allergic reaction.I will update this once I finally figure out what is wrong with me.Thank you

title: Testicles tingling
